2055920.name: Fantasy Grounds - Pathfinder 2 RPG - Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
2055920.description:
Pathfinder 2 RPG - Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Take up arms against the Whispering Tyrant!
Fulfill your oath! When the armies of the Whispering Tyrant marched on Lastwall, the keeps and cities may have fallen, but its people and their spirit did not falter! Lost Omens Knights of Lastwall takes a detailed look at the knights that took up arms to continue the fight against the undead hordes and evils that roam the world. This book presents information on the Knights of Lastwall organization, from joining the ranks, to knightly training, to the missions to protect the innocent and defeat evil. The book also features new rules content including new equipment, magic items, spells, and support for Knights of Lastwall archetypes for players who want to play a knight in their campaigns!

Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:
  • A fully developed Reference Manual that brings the entire adventure to life. This includes all the details found in the product release as well as the exceptional artwork that can be found throughout the product - all of which is sharable with players.
  • Rich details and histories around the knights and their struggle against the Whispering Way necromancers which offer greater depth to any campaign interested in a knightly order vs undead theme.
  • Information on becoming a Knight, their training, code, slang - from life to death, to faith and foes, to allies and factions, plus much more.
  • New deities and pantheons to explore or worship.
  • New Backgrounds suitable for characters from or influenced by the Knights of Lastwall.
  • Dozens of New Feats and Many New Archetypes.
  • New Spells.
  • New Gear, Armor, Weapons, and Magic Items.
  • Gorgeous full-colored illustrations and maps the bring visual life to the regions!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Martin Blake, and Bret Davenport
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder 2.0 ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
